name: Gura May Cry
description:
Battle your way through hordes of familiar Hololive enemies as a pizza eating, gun slinging, trident wielding Gawr Gura. Traverse Amelia Watson, Mori Calliope, and Gawr Gura themed levels to battle some Holomyth members with a twist at the end.

NOTE: This game is rough as hell and currently a work in progress. I plan on updating it was some core DMC features like the style meter and actually fun bosses, along with more levels and enemies. Stay tuned and give suggestions/critiques in the comments!

Controls:

Interact/Confirm: Space Bar/Clicking on Stuff

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space Bar

Trident Attack: Left Click

GUN: Right Click

Dash: Left Click
